books.author: by Donald Trump Jr
books.description: Forays into politics and views on liberals from the executive vice president of the Trump Organization.
books.name: TRIGGERED

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: Famous examples of miscommunication serve as the backdrop to explain potential conflicts and misunderstandings.
books.name: TALKING TO STRANGERS

books.author: by Brian Kilmeade
books.description: The "Fox & Friends” host gives an account of the battle against the Mexican Army in 1836.
books.name: SAM HOUSTON AND THE ALAMO AVENGERS

books.author: by Nikki R. Haley
books.description: A memoir by the former United States ambassador to the United Nations and governor of South Carolina.
books.name: WITH ALL DUE RESPECT

books.author: by Mitch Albom
books.description: Lessons learned by the Alboms when they bring a Haitian orphan with a life-threatening illness into their family.
books.name: FINDING CHIKA

books.author: by Elton John
books.description: The multi-award-winning solo artist's first autobiography chronicles his career, relationships and private struggles.
books.name: ME

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: by Robyn Crawford
books.description: A friend and collaborator gives her account of various aspects of her relationship with the late pop star Whitney Houston.
books.name: A SONG FOR YOU

books.author: by Ronan Farrow
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning reporter details some surveillance and intimidation tactics used to pressure journalists and elude consequences by certain wealthy and connected men.
books.name: CATCH AND KILL

books.author: by Bill Bryson
books.description: An owner’s manual of the human body covering various parts, functions and what happens when things go wrong.
books.name: THE BODY

books.author: by Rachel Maddow
books.description: The MSNBC host argues that the global oil and gas industry has weakened democracies and bolstered authoritarians.
books.name: BLOWOUT

books.author: by Malcolm Nance
books.description: The former U.S. intelligence officer contends that members of the Trump administration have personal and financial ties to Vladimir Putin.
books.name: THE PLOT TO BETRAY AMERICA

books.author: by Charles Brandt
books.description: A World War II veteran works for a crime boss and comes into contact with the union boss Jimmy Hoffa. The basis of the movie "The Irishman."
books.name: I HEARD YOU PAINT HOUSES

books.author: by Prince. Edited by Dan Piepenbring
books.description: A memoir by the musician written before his death, with photos and other memorabilia detailing his evolution.
books.name: THE BEAUTIFUL ONES

books.author: by Michelle Obama
books.description: The former first lady describes her journey from the South Side of Chicago to the White House, and how she balanced work, family and her husband’s political ascent.
books.name: BECOMING
